title: #126 Scary Island Everything Iconic x Bravo's Daily Dish Crossover Bonus with Sonja Morgan (#RHONY)!
itunes:title: #126 Scary Island Everything Iconic x Bravo's Daily Dish Crossover Bonus with Sonja Morgan (#RHONY)!
itunes:subtitle: In this special crossover bonus episode event, Danny and the hosts of Bravo's The Daily Dish podcast, Megan Segura and Erik J. Mac, take a look back at #RHONY's Scary Island episodes. They discuss the iconic season 3 trip (episodes 11-13), PL...
description:
In this special crossover bonus episode event, Danny and the hosts of Bravo's The Daily Dish podcast, Megan Segura and Erik J. Mac, take a look back at #RHONY's Scary Island episodes. They discuss the iconic season 3 trip (episodes 11-13), PLUS they chat with one of the women who was on Scary Island, Sonja Morgan!


Sonja Morgan Interview: 25:53ish


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic

LINKS:
